ComicInfo.Title: Ring Around the Red Bull!
ComicInfo.Summary: Ring Around the Red Bull!: On his way to the land of the Eternals, Thor encounters the Eternal Vampiro above Hollywood. Vampiro is a masked wrestler, and has been attacked by the Deviant El Toro Rojo, posing as another masked wrestler.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:32:10. [Issue ID 33943]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Thor,not Bruce Banner but an actor in a movie),Demonio (wrestler),Deviants [El Toro Rojo],Hulk (cameo,Major Domo (cameo)],cameo),Eternals [Vampiro,Maria,Destroyer (flashback,Halcon D'oro (wrestler)
